claim:
Creating a new manuscript template
Once the necessary software is installed, from a new session in RStudio, select File  New File  RMarkdown from the menu and then when a window appears, select From Template and Elsevier Journal Article as shown in Fig. 1.
title: Fig. 1.
caption: RStudio selection window for Elsevier Journal Article.
